lead_paragraph: CAHILL--Catherine. The Board and Staff of The New York Landmarks Conservancy mourn the passing of Catherine Cahill, wife of our longtime trustee William Bernhard. Our condolences to family and friends. Lloyd P. Zuckerberg, Chair Peg Breen, President 1/3
